projects.title: Residence at Manekbaug Society
projects.description: A modern family residence focused on comfort, aesthetics, and sustainability with six bedrooms and landscaped surroundings.
projects.longDescription: The proposed bungalow project involves designing and constructing a modern family residence focused on comfort, aesthetics, and sustainability. Located at Manekbaug, the bungalow will feature six bedrooms, spacious living areas, a kitchen, dining space, and landscaped surroundings. The design emphasizes natural light from the central core through a sunroof, ventilation, and energy efficiency through eco-friendly materials and systems. The scope includes architectural, construction, and interior works, along with plumbing, electrical, and landscaping. The project aims to deliver a functional and elegant home, adhering to local building standards and ensuring high-quality construction and client satisfaction.
projects.carouselSubtitle: Modern family residence with sustainable design

projects.title: Influencer's Studio
projects.description: A Photography Studio and Boutique blending fashion and architecture with optimized layouts for shoots and retail.
projects.longDescription: The Photography Studio on the ground floor and Boutique on the first floor create a seamless blend of fashion and architecture, where style meets storytelling. The studio provides a versatile space for fashion shoots and content creation, with optimized lighting and layouts. The boutique showcases curated collections with thoughtful circulation. Architectural elements including a spiral staircase, arched entrance, and curtain backdrop of changing room, double as striking photography corners along with the designer sofa and dressing corner with backlit mirror adding to the visual appeal. Textures, finishes, and smart magnetic lighting combine to create an immersive environment for designers, models, and creators to capture and express their artistic vision.
projects.carouselSubtitle: Where fashion meets architecture and storytelling

projects.title: 4BHK Residence at Shilp 14
projects.description: An elegant and luxurious 4BHK residence with designer furniture, statement pieces, and premium materials.
projects.longDescription: The 4BHK residence exudes elegance and luxury, transforming a spacious layout into a sophisticated home. Each bedroom is designed as a private retreat with designer furniture, ambient lighting, and ample closet space. The living and dining areas feature statement pieces, feature walls, and curated decor that create a sense of grandeur. The kitchen and bathrooms are crafted with premium materials, blending functionality with high-end aesthetics. By integrating layered textures, bold accents, and strategic lighting, the interiors achieve a refined yet inviting ambiance, offering a lifestyle-oriented space that reflects modern elegance while ensuring comfort for the entire family. The cohesive design reflects the residents lifestyle.

projects.title: 3BHK Residence at Shivanta Rigel
projects.description: A contemporary, cozy 3BHK apartment balancing style and functionality with open-plan living areas.
projects.longDescription: The 3BHK apartment is reimagined as a contemporary, cozy home that balances style and functionality. The design emphasizes fluidity, with open-plan living and dining areas that encourage social interaction. Bedrooms are intimate sanctuaries, featuring soft textures, tailored storage, and ambient lighting. The kitchen and utility spaces are streamlined for practicality, while bathrooms incorporate subtle modern accents. Through a thoughtful mix of muted colors, warm textures, and clever lighting, the interiors create a welcoming atmosphere that feels personal and lived-in, making the space both comfortable for daily living and visually appealing.

projects.title: Theme Based Bedroom for Hotwheels Fanboy
projects.description: An immersive car-themed bedroom design with blue and grey tones, featuring hotwheels collections and personalized accents.
projects.longDescription: This theme-based bedroom design transforms a personal space into an immersive retreat that reflects both character and comfort. The concept revolves around cars, specifically hotwheels. The combination of blue and grey along with the colorful miniatures reflect the boyish charm and create a cohesive visual story. Every element - from furniture selection to accent details - was curated to balance aesthetics with functionality. The layout maximizes natural light and spatial harmony, while custom finishes and décor elements reinforce the theme's identity. The result is a bedroom that feels personal, stylish, and deeply connected to its concept.
projects.carouselTitle: Theme Based Bedroom for Hotwheels Fanboy
projects.carouselSubtitle: An immersive car-themed retreat for enthusiasts

projects.title: Office at Colonnade 2
projects.description: An efficient and professional office space with reception, director cabins, workstations, and modern amenities.
projects.longDescription: The 900 sq.ft office is designed for efficiency, functionality, and a professional yet welcoming atmosphere. The layout includes a reception and waiting area, two private Director Cabins, open workstations for staff, a pantry, and a toilet, carefully arranged to maximize space and workflow. Ergonomic furniture, smart storage, and strategic lighting enhance comfort and productivity. Neutral tones, subtle accents, and branding elements create a cohesive, visually appealing environment. The design focuses on balancing collaborative and private spaces within a compact footprint, ensuring a functional, comfortable, and aesthetically pleasing office that meets the needs of employees and visitors alike.

projects.title: Residence at Swati Apartment
projects.description: A stylish renovation of two bedrooms, living room, and kitchen with peacock blue and grey color palettes.
projects.longDescription: The renovation of two bedrooms, the living room, and the kitchen reimagines the home as a sanctuary of style, comfort, and connection. The living room unfolds as a warm social hub with curated textures and mood lighting that invite conversation. The kitchen becomes a functional yet artistic centerpiece, blending craftsmanship with modern design. One bedroom is enveloped in a rich peacock blue palette, creating a bold yet calming retreat that celebrates individuality. A serene temple space adds spiritual grounding, connecting design and mindfulness. The second bedroom contrasts beautifully in subtle grey tones, exuding softness, balance, and quiet sophistication. Together, these spaces form a cohesive narrative of color, texture, individuality and modern living.
projects.carouselSubtitle: A sanctuary of style, comfort, and connection

projects.title: Prime Luxury Residence near Paldi
projects.description: An ultra-prime 4BHK residence with dual living rooms, home theatre, and spacious terrace embodying grandeur and luxury.
projects.longDescription: The ultra-prime 4BHK residence is envisioned as a luxurious and contemporary home that embodies grandeur, comfort, and exclusivity. Designed for a refined lifestyle, the home features dual living rooms for formal and family gatherings, a plush home theatre for immersive entertainment, and a spacious terrace that extends the indoors into a serene outdoor retreat. The open living areas and terrace blur the line between indoor and outdoor living, creating seamless spatial flow. Each bedroom is curated as a private sanctuary, blending bespoke finishes with warm textures and mood lighting. The interiors celebrate craftsmanship through exquisite materials, statement décor, and layered lighting. Seamless spatial flow, refined detailing, and an elevated aesthetic make this residence a timeless expression of sophistication and modern luxury.

projects.title: Residence at Aarohi Crest
projects.description: A 3BHK renovation focusing on comfort and functionality with modern furnishings and refined aesthetics.
projects.longDescription: The 3bhk renovation project focuses on redefining comfort, functionality, and aesthetic appeal within existing spaces. The living room and kitchen is transformed into a warm, inviting area with modern furnishings, mood lighting, and a refined color palette that enhances spatial flow and social interaction. The bedroom is redesigned as a serene retreat, featuring soothing tones, soft textures, and smart storage solutions for a clutter-free ambiance. Premium materials and thoughtful detailing bring cohesiveness to both spaces, seamlessly blending style and comfort. The renovation creates a refreshed, contemporary home environment that reflects the client's personality and elevates everyday living.
